attributes.action: take action to prevent the closure of Corus on Teesside
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The message is simple. The Prime Minister must intervene to stop the closure of Corus and the loss of many jobs as this will have a significant negative effect on the economy of Teesside. They bailed out the banks so why can't they help industry. It is not good enough the government to claim they can't do anything. The can and they must!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
